metadata.name: The Portal | COYA Dubai
metadata.description:
The female is an ode to COYA dubai, a celestial portal embellished with elements that pay ode to both Peru and Dubai, showcasing Incan and Arabian motifs. 

Inspired by the mystic tales of Peruvian culture, COYA's vibrant values and the essence of the UAE, this NFT depicts a fine balancing act of masculine and feminine, simultaneously being tenacious yet playful.

The COYA UAE pieces are distinct by aesthetic but the same in ethos, much like the two Emirates.
